Title: Global Intelligence Pipeline: How We’re Crafting Inference at the Edge
Abstract: AI is a hot and rapidly developing topic in the cloud space. In this session, topics covered will include market trends, future directions, training, and inference. Get up to date on the latest AI trends and news, including the value cloud can deliver to AI and Gcore's Inference at the Edge, including real-life scenarios where the company helped customers using AI

Title: Taming the Wild West of Model Deployment
Abstract: In the rapidly evolving landscape of data science, model deployment stands as a pivotal frontier. In this talk, I’ll delve into the essential strategies for navigating this terrain with confidence and finesse using a case study from my previous experience.

Title: Deep Learning for Protein Structure Prediction
Abstract: Unlock the potential of deep learning in decoding protein structures. Reshaping drug discovery with practical insights.

Title: The Influence of Artificial Intelligence on Creative Thought in Design: Exploring the Intersection of AI and Creativity in Shaping the Future
Abstract: Imagine a future where AI fuels our creativity in design, pushing boundaries and unlocking new possibilities. Join me as we explore how AI revolutionizes creative thought, shaping a future where innovation knows no bounds!

Title: Dynamic User Interfaces: Harnessing AI and Machine Learning for Personalized, Emotion-Aware Experiences
Abstract: Imagine interfaces that not only respond to user clicks but also anticipate their needs and emotions in real-time. That's the frontier we're exploring—how AI and ML are shaping the next generation of user interfaces. Join me as we uncover the possibilities!

Title: Building a Design System in Limited Timeframes
Abstract: Gain insights on how designers in startups can efficiently create design systems despite time constraints. Gain practical strategies and AI tools for impactful designs in a sustainable manner.

Title: Maximizing Efficiency with AI Tools as Catalysts
Abstract: Learn how to use Large Language Models to optimise workflows by automating repetitive tasks, boosting productivity. This talk illustrates suitable applications and example architectures to empower teams' self-service.

Title: Leveraging AI to Revolutionize Backend Architectures in Dating Applications: A Python-Centric Approach
Abstract: Unlock the future of dating apps with AI! As a Software Engineer at Rapyd, I'll dive into how Python's power transforms backend architectures for matchmaking precision and scalability. Discover cutting-edge AI integration and data analytics strategies to redefine connections. Don't miss out!

Title: The Human Touch in AI-Driven Business Development: Striking the Right Balance
Abstract: Managing AI-driven business development necessitates finesse—balancing innovation with the timeless value of human connection. Join me as we investigate the balance between tech and the human touch, ensuring that our strategies complement rather than replace the personal element of business success.

Title: A Product Manager’s Take on the “AI-fication” in the World of Fintech
Abstract: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing fintech, reshaping online payment methods and optimizing operational efficiency. With a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 23.7%, the AI fintech market is booming.

Title: AI and Disability: Inclusion or Exclusion?
Abstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is making a lot of noise with the emergence of multiple AI-based tools. But when you are have a disability, does it really change your life or does it isolate you even more? Is the emergence of AI revolutionizing our daily accessibility?

Title: Navigating the Ethical Terrain of AI-Enhanced Marketing Automation: Strategies for Responsible Innovation
Abstract: Discover how ethical AI can boost marketing: Enhance customer engagement by 40% and reduce costs by 30%, while safeguarding data and building trust. Join us to master the best practices for using AI responsibly in marketing, ensuring brand loyalty and compliance

Title: Semi-Supervised Learning. How to overcome the lack of labels
Abstract: Prepare for an exciting journey into the Semi-Supervised learning journey. It uses minimal labelled data to guide the analysis of abundant unlabeled data, saving time and resources while maintaining accuracy. Perfect for AI applications in label-limited scenarios.

Title: Bias in AI: How to monitor, measure and mitigate it using real-life case studies
Abstract: This talk would focus on some real life use cases of bias in AI and how it had socioeconomic impact, along with practical mitigation strategies to make AI more responsible. The session would dive deep into how and where bias manifests in the overall ML cycle, and ways to measure and remove it.

Title: The Art of Data Story Telling, Powered by Oracle Analytics
Abstract: Ever wondered why Oracle Analytics is rated the best in the critical data storytelling capabilities for Analytics and BI platforms? This session takes you through all the best-in-class features of Oracle Analytics that combine the ML & AI feature sets integrated into this powerful application.

Title: Vector Databases 101 - How do they work?
Abstract: Discover how Vector DB work behind the scene and how they are powered. Lot of people are using them but knowing how they work isn't something common. We will go over the different implementations, indexes, metrics and people should have a better idea on how they work after this talk.

Title: Why Most Data Projects Fail and How to Avoid It
Abstract: Unfortunately, the majority of data projects fail. Yet, they fail for the same reasons. This talk will explore the most common reasons data projects fail and how to avoid them. We will do this by introducing the who, what, when, where, and how of data projects.

Title: A data-driven approach to Product Discovery
Abstract: Dive into the heartbeat of product discovery! Join me in unlocking the power of a data-driven approach. From Uber to Revolut, my journey unveils how strategic data insights can transform product road mapping. Let's amplify your discovery process with actionable data for innovation that resonates!

Title: A Beginner's Guide to Adversarial Machine Learning
Abstract: As we begin to rely on machine learning for daily tasks, threat actors will begin to target machine learning. In this session, attendees will learn about adversarial machine learning and the different kinds of attacks on ML and about open-source industry solutions that aim to mitigate these attacks.

Title: Design Think before you create your next AI product
Abstract: Usually, the talks on AI are about technical issues & future predictions, resulting in products that are "cool" technologically but “unfit” in addressing the real needs of users. This session aims at breaking that trend & bringing AI/ML developers closer to the process of design thinking.

Title: Beyond Human Touch: AI's Emerging Role in Ad Content Creation
Abstract: Discover how AI revolutionizes finance ad content creation! From efficiency gains to ethical considerations, explore the future of marketing where AI augments creativity and ensures compliance.

Title: Card Payments Lifecycle Explained
Abstract: Unravelling the card payment process from swipe to settlement

Title: Efficiency through Stateless Microservices: Streamlining Request Handling
Abstract: Discover how stateless microservices streamline request handling in distributed systems, ensuring scalability and reliability. Learn key design principles and implementation strategies for optimizing performance in a fast-paced world of dozens of requests.

Title: Framework & Lessons Learned From Building a Generative AI Application
Abstract: Join Jason as he unveils the secrets of building cutting-edge Generative AI applications. Dive deep into the framework, drawing from real-world experiences. Gain insights and a roadmap for your own success in this dynamic field. Don't miss this opportunity to set the stage for your success in GenAI.

Title: Semantic Segmentation of Blastocyst Images
Abstract: Unlocking AI's potential in embryology: Learn how advanced deep learning models can accurately analyze blastocyst images from diverse clinics, revolutionizing research and diagnostics. Don't miss this opportunity to stay at the forefront of AI in healthcare!

Title: End-to-End Learning Enabled by Deep Learning
Abstract: Unlock AI's potential! End-to-End Learning with Deep Learning revolutionizes, simplifies, and accelerates. Dive in now!

Title: Unleashing Innovation: Mastering AI Product Management for Enterprises
Abstract: Join me as I unveil the strategies and insights behind Product Management for Enterprise Generative AI. Learn from my experiences at Microsoft and Meta to navigate the complexities of AI product development and drive innovation in enterprise solutions.

Title: Enterprise AI Implementation - Tech Stack, Use-cases and Success Back to original talk
Abstract: Begin your AI journey! Join my Enterprise AI Implementation session for an in-depth look at the technology stack, real-world use cases, and success stories. Improve your grasp of AI deployment in organizations!

Title: A GenAI Pipeline for Content Generation with Apache Airflow
Abstract: Get a tour through the code of an end-to-end GenAI Airflow pipeline, using custom information in an RAG pattern and fine-tuning GPT-3.5 Turbo for your content generation use case. The pipeline code is open-source and will be provided to you.

Title: Unveiling Tomorrow: Exploring the Frontiers of Generative AI
Abstract: With millions already benefiting from models like Chat-GPT or Claude, transformative power of GenAI is reshaping industries. That’s just the beginning. Discover the emerging trends in this field, as we delve into the technical, ethical, and business implications of this groundbreaking technology!

Title: Enriching Generative AI as Events in Real-Time Streaming Pipelines
Abstract: Let's build streaming pipelines that convert streaming events into prompts and call LLMs and process the results.

Title: Self-Hosted Open Source LLMs: Best Practices and Strategies
Abstract: While a lot of organizations utilize 3rd-party APIs and services to build generative AI-powered applications, we are seeing more teams set up their own self-hosted large language models (LLMs). In this session, we will discuss various best practices when building and managing self-hosted LLMs.

Title: Ecommerce OMNI Channel optimization using AI
Abstract: Delve into advanced AI and analytics strategies to optimize omnichannel order fulfillment, incorporating intelligent sourcing and inventory management. Witness tangible results knowing how machine learning can analyze your historical order data, and give a near to accurate prediction.

Title: Run LLMs across devices with a 2MB Inference App
Abstract:
Run LLM apps with Zero python dependency. Dive in to learn a strong alternative to Python in AI inference.
Compared with Python, Rust+Wasm apps could be 1/100 of the size, 100x the speed, and securely run everywhere at full hardware acceleration without any change to the binary code.

Title: Unlocking LLM Potential: A Journey with APIs
Abstract: For years we have been creating APIs, opening our systems to other applications and users. Now, we can use all that functionality with the simplest of interfaces: Natural Language.

Title: Forecasting time-series with Polars and Deno
Abstract: This session is a presentation of novel concept of time-series processing pipeline for MLOps - polars for data modelling - fast task running framework written in Deno - WASM tasks in which we do forecasting Focus on possible performance improvement in production deployments of time-series models‎ .

Title: MLOps: From Jupyter to Production
Abstract:
Taking a model from Jupyter to a production application is not a trivial task.
In this short talk, we cover the whole process, starting from a Jupyter Notebook and finishing on a deployed model on HuggingFace.co. We'll be using open-source and free services only.

JobTitle1: President - Developer Relations, Dev Marketing, and Community Programming
Title: Real Time and Historical NLP-Enriched Market Dashboard with RisingWave and Chat-GPT
Abstract: We will show how to use RisingWave stream processing database to write efficient stream-processing jobs for real-time market data enriched with NLP-based indicators from Chat-GPT.

Title: Topic modelling for text documents using NLP techniques
Abstract: I am a data engineering professional and have helped companies like AWS manage streaming data at scale and support analytics over it. My solution helped organisations convert batch processing pipelines to real time pipeline and hence reduce data freshness from 75+ hours to less than 40 minutes.

Title: From Code to Insight: Using NLP and Pattern Analysis in Git History
Abstract: Discover how NLP and pattern analysis can transform raw Git history into valuable insights. Explore innovative ways to leverage Apache Tika, Git archives, and data aggregation to reveal trends, behaviors, and project dynamics.

Title: ML in Search: Learning to Rank
Abstract: Discover the future of document search with AI! Join me as I unravel the secrets behind building an AI-powered document search platform, tailored specifically for financial professionals.

Title: Affordable ML Platform
Abstract: Building an end-to-end ML platform requires vision, strategy, and execution. From data acquisition to model deployment, it's about seamless integration, robust infrastructure, and scalable workflows. Let's empower innovation with a comprehensive ML ecosystem.

Title: GDPR and Beyond: Demystifying Data Governance Challenges
Abstract: Explore critical aspects of data governance, compliance, and development in the evolving data landscape. Learn how robust data governance addresses challenges and ensures compliance with global regulations. Join us for a concise and insightful session.

JobTitle1: Generative AI, AI/ML Architect, MLOps, and Security
Title: LLM SecOps
Abstract: This talk highlights the impact of Large Language Models (LLMs) on natural language understanding and addresses their security vulnerabilities. It promotes integrating SecOps practices throughout the LLM lifecycle, emphasizing automation and collaboration to enhance security.

Title: The Privacy Predicament: Averting the Perils of Data-Hungry Language Models
Abstract: The privacy paradox raises alarming risks of data leaks, bias propagation, and psychological harm. This session unravels this ethical quandary, exploring cutting-edge solutions to preserve privacy while responsibly harnessing language AI's immense potential.

Title: Using Quix, Hugging Face, and InfluxDB to for Anomaly Detection and Forecasting
Abstract: In this talk, we will learn about how to build a data streaming pipeline that performs anomaly detection (Keras Autoencoders) and forecasting (Holt Winters) of generator data with Quix, Hugging Face, and InfluxDB.

Title: Optimising Apache Spark and SQL for improved performance
Abstract: Unlock the secrets of Apache Spark optimisation. Dive into manual aspects and technical know-how for enhancing performance. Our talk provides practical solutions to optimise Spark's functionality, empowering you with the skills to achieve peak performance in your data-driven projects.

Title: Data Generative AI and Real-Time Reporting at Scale
Abstract: Steve is the founder of a Data Generative AI company. Most people don't know that there is a difference between 'Data Generative AI' and 'Generative AI', like Chat GPT. Steve will explain what tools to use to fill the gaps where Chat GPT fails, and what to think about when adopting an AI tool.

Title: The Rise of AI Agents
Abstract: 25 years after Agent Smith coined "Never send a human to do a machine's job", this futuristic idea seems closer than ever. Join us as we discover how AI agents are becoming the "jack-of-all-trades" in the tech world, revolutionizing the way we work and interact with technology.

Title: Adapting to Change: Navigating Market Shifts in the Tech Industry
Abstract: Embark on a journey through tech's ever-changing landscapes! Join me to explore dynamic strategies for navigating market shifts. Learn to identify trends, pivot strategies, and unearth case studies of companies thriving amidst change. Don't just adapt, thrive in the evolving tech industry!

Title: Revolutionizing Sustainability: AI-Driven Disassembly for a Circular Economy
Abstract: Discover how AI and robotics revolutionize product disassembly, boosting material recovery by 50%, reducing waste, and advancing sustainability. Join us to explore groundbreaking technologies that marry economic growth with ecological responsibility in the circular economy.
